extendedInfo.description: The #1 free parental controls and internet filter desktop software is now available for Android as a safe browser for your family. Backed by Blue Coat Systems' leading web filtering and content control technology, your children will receive the same protection trusted by Fortune 500 companies around the world. Firefox-based Browser â¢ Screen Rotation â¢ Pinch and Zoom â¢ URL History â¢ Multiple Tabs â¢ Print â¢ Safe Search â¢ BookmarksBlocks Adult and Potentially Offensive Sites â¢ Pornography â¢ Open Image/Media Search â¢ Extreme â¢ Adult/Mature Content â¢ Nudity â¢ Intimate Apparel/Swimsuit â¢ Violence/Hate/Racism Filters Potentially Malicious Sites â¢ Phishing â¢ Proxy Avoidance â¢ Spyware/Malware Sources â¢ Spyware Effects â¢ Suspicious Stops Potentially Illegal Sites â¢ Hacking â¢ Illegal/Questionable â¢ Illegal Drugs â¢ Peer-to-Peer â¢ Gambling Prevents Access to Parent-Child Discussion Topics â¢ Abortion â¢ Sex Education â¢ Alternative Sexuality/Lifestyles â¢ Personals/DatingFor descriptions of the categories, visit http://sitereview.bluecoat.com More information about K9 Web Protection for Windows, Mac, iOS, or Android is available at http://www.k9webprotection.com

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Best web filter services, and free as well. I had this program on my home computer and worked pretty we\'ll. I\'m happy to finally get the android version.
reviews.author: Tau Mokoena

reviews.title: Best content filtering app I could find.
reviews.comment: only app that blocks erasing the browser history, blocks using the native browser, youtube, social apps, gambling, etc.  And such an easy, straightforward setup.  My only complaint is the slow browser, and poor mobile internet browsing provided through the browser.
reviews.author: Bryan Hepburn

reviews.title: great!
reviews.comment: i\'ve always loved this app for the pc/mac/iphone, and now it\'s available for android. Finally!!! If you want to keep your kids safe, install this app. I\'m not always able to completely monitor what my 13 year old daughter does with her phone, but this makes me feel that she is somewhat protected. I\'ve also restricted the google play store, set content filtering, set pin access to the market, locked k9 as much as possible, removed apps like titanium backup that can remove almost anything, and purchased super
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Working smooth in my  nexus 7 android 4.3 blocks other browsers in admin mode now it cant be killed from task manager. Great tweaks and features and good browsing experience.features requested:- 1)password recovery and email change just like PC,2) highlight word or sentence and a dialogue box can open dictionary or wiki app to quick search and put the word for future reference. 3) always dark theme 4) can filter YouTube videos and only allow you tube app to stream videos permitted by your app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Makes phone very slow also this app can be bypassed if phone is reset; therefore it lacks that block as well. And this app kills battery! !!! These guys have a lot to do
reviews.author: josh Swope

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: An excellent web filter, definitely the best currently available on android. NOTE: Most ppl are unaware that the YouTube app CAN be unblocked. You just have to change a setting. It\'s pretty much the only thing that can be unblocked at present though.
reviews.author: Jordan Curwen-Walker

reviews.title: Slow browser, YouTube blocked
reviews.comment: I like the browser, keeps the kids from getting into things they shouldn\'t be. Two complaints that I hope will be addressed.   First, browser is slow, feels like your on 1x at times.  Second, YouTube is blocked on this browser, and there is no way to unblock it. I know you can use the app, but many times links to YouTube have to go through the browser first where they get blocked.   Please fix above and I will give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Ammar Alo

reviews.title: Issues
reviews.comment: It holds memory or something it shouldnt when i search something and click images it adds on a ton of extra stuff after what i typed. Its the same stuff every time
reviews.author: Caleb Colosky

reviews.title: Allows gay apps
reviews.comment: Why do you allow Gay apps to be downloaded when it is set for a child\'s cell phone?  How can this be stopped?  What are we doing wrong that these apps are getting through your filter system.
reviews.author: David Six

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Its a good app... and it blocks other browsers that\'s great. But yeah... it needs still approvement... I cant go back to the launcher sometimes, it just stays in the app...
reviews.author: Miramis Lala

reviews.title: Best app for browser Filtering
reviews.comment: Kudos k9! Thank God for your team that has made the k9 filter service into such a useful tool. I am using both PC and iOS versions, and the Android version for smartphones are much better compared to iOS. Is it possible to revamp it?=) may God cont to bless you all to be a greater blessing to the people around the world =)
reviews.author: Jacob Lim

reviews.title: No YouTube?
reviews.comment: You need to be able to customize the things you filter! Maybe by key word or something. Who knows
reviews.author: Justin Carruthers

reviews.comment: Like , but wish you could view like video / facebook post  or search non mature videos. The best filter, just needs to be better or have the same opt
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not Consistently Blocking Youtube
reviews.comment: Update: Notice that K9 does not start when my phone starts, thus there\'s no blocking... hum....  After a restart, Youtube is NOT blocked unless K9 is started before the Youtube app.  In other words, after restarting my phone, I have unblocked access to Youtube until AFTER I start K9 for the 1st time. This seems like a big fail...
reviews.author: Ron Dean

reviews.title: Very bad
reviews.comment: Why it doesn\'t run as a service?, it can be killed by 8 yearsold via task killer widget built into the system even in admin mode... also why there is no way to set blocked categories...!!!
reviews.author: Nour Eldien Hesham

reviews.title: Great free!!
reviews.comment: Its the best free web protection browser i have ever seen.Its awesome and morever free.But its really slow:(please solve it and I\'ll rate it 5stars
reviews.author: Raunak Brij

reviews.title: Very slow and bad image
reviews.comment: The filter protects very well but the browser is very slow and have bad quality images
reviews.author: tommy apter

reviews.title: Great safe browser
reviews.comment: Works great and helps filter explicit content
reviews.author: Ezequiel Hernandez

reviews.title: Browser blocks it\'s own homepage.
reviews.comment: I loved this app before the most recent update. Now I can\'t use the browser at all. Something about a proxy. It really defeats the purpose of a smart phone when I can\'t use an internet browser. Motorola Photon.
reviews.author: Jaycey Ward

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: When its actually working, since last update browser will only work about half of the time.
reviews.author: Daniel Kozminski
